descriptionHtml:
ok.
<br />overhaul of textures werewolf for an ultra aggressive and spooky look!
<br />Look a lot less: comics my taste.
<br />-increase the full details of the body and head
<br />-a thicker skin and relief of bone and muscle (sk) and more .......
<br />
<br />Original mod (by Zerofrost)(Apex werewolf) required: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36497/?
<br />-install the mod.
<br />-remplace the texture folder by mine.
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />Bonus: new sk for male and female for the relief of the body and head ....
<br />(original texture mod : all in one face)
<br />
<br />Test and enjoy.
author: exilia
